version: 1.1
var1:  # a first variable
  - no
  - yes
  - maybe
var2:
  description: a second variable
  multi: true
  default:
    jinja: |
      {% for val in _.var1 %}
      {{ val }}
      {% endfor %}
    description: the value of _.var1
